name: VIR-274.01 Verify that the products within disallowed color/category is not shown to the shopper for appropriate unit/school at the following pages

userStory.narrative:
As a system, I require the ability to manage the categories and colors that each
school will be able to view on the shop.virco site via
impex so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-274.01 Verify that the products within disallowed color/category is not shown to the shopper for appropriate unit/school at the following pages
description:
Examples:
|pages|
|Search results|
|Any product carousel|
|Recommended products|
|Category pages|
